measured_by: estimation task predictions (RMSE & Spearman correlation with criterion values)
justification: "This estimation task immediately followed the choice task, and crucially, enabled us to identify whether participants learned the cue weights or only the cue order… as indicated by the mean Spearman correlation and root mean square error (RMSE) between predictions and criterion values."

measured_by: periodic insight questions using -10 to +10 Likert scale ratings
justification: "Every 40 trials in the choice task we asked participants to rate the strength of each cue's effect on option value… on a scale from -10 (highly negative) to 10 (highly positive)."

measured_by: mean rank of options chosen within each 40-trial block
justification: "We measured participants' performance in the choice task as the mean rank of options chosen in each block of 40 trials in the task."

measured_by: model fit comparison via Bayesian Information Criterion after fitting WADD and DE models to choice data
justification: "We fitted WADD and DE model to each individual's data… and categorized participants as users of a certain strategy by selecting the strategy with the lowest BIC value for that participant."
